Post.title: jsie8
Post._content:
{% blockquote %}
    gulpgrunt,uglify.js,ie8
{% endblockquote%}


# uglify.jsie8

## gulp

### 

```
npm install --save-dev uglify-js
npm install --save-dev gulp-uglify/minifier

```

### options

```
gulp.src(paths.tmp.modules)
    .pipe(minifier({
        output:{
            quote_keys:true
        },
        compress:{
            screw_ie8:false
        }
    }, uglifyjs))
    .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist.modules));

```

* minifier options

    * quote_keys:keyiedeletetrue

    * screw_ie8:ie8


## grunt

### 

```
npm install --save-dev grunt-uglify

```

### options

screwIE8: false
